body: Fix #7371. <http://tukaani.org/xz/xz-5.2.3.tar.bz2> has been redirected to <https://sourceforge.net/projects/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.3.tar.bz2/download> which ruturns a useless html file from wget. Repalcing the URLs with a usable sourceforge mirror URLs like <https://netcologne.dl.sourceforge.net/project/lzmautils/xz-5.2.3.tar.bz2>.
title: Fix download url for xz.
